PHPViewWidgets\Widgets
namespace
PHPViewWidgets\Widgets
PHPViewWidgets\Widgets\UILink

This class represents a link widget, it IS NOT a container widget.

Information
Extends

PHPViewWidgets\Widgets\UIWidget

Options

This class accepts the following options:

rel

The rel attribute.

href

The href attribute.

type

An optional type attribute.

other

An optional attribute to placed verbatium.
